member.name: M:Imi.Project.Api.Controllers.AircraftsController.Get(System.Nullable{System.Boolean},System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Gets a list of all aircrafts in the database. You can also filter the list.
member.param: Will filter on special livery when not null
Will filter on aircraft registration when not null
Will filter on aircrafttype when not null
Will filter on airline when not null
Will filter on airport when not null. Currently broken
member.response: Succesfully returns a list of aircrafts
Cannot find any aircraft that match filter parameters

member.name: M:Imi.Project.Api.Controllers.AircraftsController.Get(System.Guid)

member.param: The id of the aircraft that you want details of

member.name: M:Imi.Project.Api.Controllers.AircraftsController.Post(Imi.Project.Api.Core.Dtos.Aircraft.AircraftRequestDto)
member.summary: Adds a new aircraft to the database
member.remarks:
Sample request:
{ "registration": "OO-ABC", "hasSpecialLivery": true, "firstSeen": "2020-07-13", "lastSeen": "2022-02-11", "image": null, "longitude": null, "latitude": null, "airlineId": "92c70a1d-e55a-4e36-a504-1c477c3c4b1c", "aircraftTypeId": "f10b801f-ef2d-481b-9cfe-4bfe6182a832", "airportIds": [ "e2be3bd6-4c7b-41f4-a5c8-a1940310ea7d", "d8806f32-bf51-4b76-8c4f-37e0f532a6a7" ] } Caution: This is purely an example, it might not work depending on current id values

member.name: M:Imi.Project.Api.Controllers.AircraftsController.Put(Imi.Project.Api.Core.Dtos.Aircraft.AircraftRequestDto)
member.remarks:
Sample request:
{ "id": "036f4398-a726-4839-4931-08da0e7ef24d", "addedOn": "2022-03-25T17:51:32.6092821", "registration": "OO-ABC", "hasSpecialLivery": true, "firstSeen": "2020-07-13", "lastSeen": "2022-02-11", "image": null, "longitude": null, "latitude": null, "airlineId": "92c70a1d-e55a-4e36-a504-1c477c3c4b1c", "aircraftTypeId": "f10b801f-ef2d-481b-9cfe-4bfe6182a832", "airportIds": [ "e2be3bd6-4c7b-41f4-a5c8-a1940310ea7d", "d8806f32-bf51-4b76-8c4f-37e0f532a6a7" ] } Caution: This is purely an example, it might not work depending on current id values
